data.title: Home - International Films - Independent Films
data.meta_description: Music Box Films is a Chicago based theatrical and home entertainment distributor of international and independent films.
data.meta_site_name: International Films - Independent Films | Music Box Films
data.text:
“A quietly moving proclamation of presence” … “the way Sorelle thinks of gentrification rewards our close attention.”

An IndieWire Critic’s Pick! “Monia Chokri‘s brilliant feature is one of the sharpest cinematic examinations of the paradoxical expectations we place on our relationships in the 21st century.”

“The feature is a visual poem, an enveloping four-stanza ode to experiences shared by a man and his daughters.”

“Carson Lund treats the power of a shared interest with profound, elegiac empathy.”

A New York Times Critic’s Pick! “…a lively, absorbing documentary…” “…‘Ennio’ is another cinephilic paean.”

“an ode to the human marvels of flyover country”
